originalText.text:
You know how everyone says "I know the BEST fill-in-the-blank", but then you're let down when you go there?

Well, I've had the best experience (on and off for 3 years) for a variety of issues — and referred loads of people to Stroma.

And my friends agree. Stroma is a world class physical therapy practice.

Run, walk, limp, wheel in. You'll be happy you did.

Run, walk, limp, wheel in. You'll be happy you did.

originalText.text:
Very harmonious and pleasant atmosphere. Very professional staff and PT's. My personal PT is very detailed oriented and remembers my trouble spots and helps me to improve my mobility.
Everyone acknowledges you by name with a smile! Nice and clean loft style space.

text.text:

Everyone acknowledges you by name with a smile! Nice and clean loft style space.

originalText.text:
Stroma Physical Therapy has been a tremendous help to my shoulder recovery. I cannot recommend them highly enough!

After seeing multiple other physical therapists and specialists, I finally felt better thanks to the help of Vinita, Mairead, Alyssa, Michelle, and the rest of the Stroma team.

Vinita’s deep medical knowledge coupled with her intuition and tenacious trial-and-error approach absolutely helped identify the issues I’d been having in my shoulder. She zeroed in on the specific problem area after a few sessions and designed a comprehensive strengthening routine tailored to my issue (leveraging Pilates, my favorite type of exercise!).

This along with the many other treatments she offers — including ultrasound, laser light treatment, cupping, cervical traction, and electro-stimulation — finally made my year-long shoulder pain start to abate.

Thank you to the whole Stroma team!

originalText.text: I've been to a number of physical therapists over the years and can only wish they had all been as attentive, hands-on and effective as Stroma PT. I went in with a pressed nerve issue that was causing weakness and pain in my right leg. The head of the practice, Vinita, spent numerous sessions not only fixing the immediate problem with extensive massage and ultrasound, but also analyzed my stride and underlying arthritic condition to come up with a series of exercises to keep the condition from returning.  Vinita is conscientious and knowledgable, and I can't recommend her practice enthusiastically enough.

originalText.text: Vinita and Stroma are genius. I am cured. I am happy. I am educated. I am at peace. I am hopeful and driven to stay healthy.
